name: replicator
description: GCR service for replicating Firestore writes to Supabase.

scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn --cwd=../shared alias && yarn alias && yarn dist
scripts.dist:prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/common/lib dist/backend/shared/lib dist/backend/replicator/lib
scripts.dist:copy: cp -R ../../common/lib/* dist/common/lib && cp -R ../shared/lib/* dist/backend/shared/lib && cp -R ./lib/* dist/backend/replicator/lib && cp ../../yarn.lock dist && cp package.json dist
scripts.regen-types: supabase gen types typescript --project-id pxidrgkatumlvfqaxcll --schema public > ../common/supabase/schema.ts
scripts.regen-types-dev: supabase gen types typescript --project-id mfodonznyfxllcezufgr --schema public > ../common/supabase/schema.ts
